All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Arrow
Arrows are drawn around the player and point to enemies.
CreditsActivity
The activity that displays credits.
DatabaseHelper
The class that defines an object used for saving game info into an SQLite database.
Director
The object responsible for enemy generation at the beginning of each level
Drawable
An interface for drawable objects.
Enemy
An abstract, AI controlled enemy.
Entity
Defines dynamic object, with health and damage
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
Exploder
Defines the Exploder enemy type.
GameHistoryActivity
 
GameModel
A class of an object that contains the properties of a game.
GameOverDialogFragment
The dialog that is shown when the game is over.
HealthPack
A health pack that heals the player.
HighScoresActivity
An activity that displays high scores.
Laserman
Defines the Laserman enemy type.
LevelEndDialogFragment
The dialog that is shown after finishing each level.
MainActivity
The main game activity, where the game itself runs.
MainView
The main game view.
Manager
The object that is responsible for running the main thread of the game world.
MenuActivity
The main menu activity.
MusicService
A service that plays music during gameplay.
Player
The player class.
Projectile
Defines a round projectile, moving in a straight line.
SettingsActivity
The activity that allows to change settings.
Shooter
Defines the shooter enemy type.
Store
Contains methods to store and read from shared preferences.
Summoner
Defines the Summoner enemy type.
Timer
A timer that can be paused, and is used to measure playtime.
Vector2
Defines a 2-dimensional vector object, with float coordinates.
